meanings.definition: Messieurs: plural form of monsieur, used to address or refer to two or more men
meanings.sent1: The messieurs at the meeting were discussing business matters.
meanings.sent2: Please welcome the messieurs to the conference room.
meanings.sent3: The messieurs decided to wear matching ties to the event.
meanings.sent4: The messieurs stood out in their sharp suits like a trio of penguins.
meanings.sent5: The messieurs greeted each other with firm handshakes and smiles.

meanings.definition: Messieurs: used as a formal title before the name of a man in France
meanings.sent1: Messieurs Pierre and Jacques arrived at the party together.
meanings.sent2: The letter was addressed to Messieurs Dupont and Leclerc.
meanings.sent3: The waiter addressed the young boys as messieurs, making them feel grown-up.
meanings.sent4: The title of messieurs added an air of sophistication to the event.
meanings.sent5: The messieurs were treated with utmost respect wherever they went.
